concept.title: 2.ApplicabilityofCommercialDerivativeMilitaryArticlesCDMAtoSpecialtyMetals Applicability of Commercial Derivative Military Articles (CDMA) to Specialty Metals

conbody.p: When a program office concludes that an item to be delivered under a prime contract is a commercial derivative military article (as defined at DFARS 252.225-7009) and the prime contractor provides the certification required at DFARS 252.225-7010, the contracting officer must prepare a CDMA D&F.
